prompts: Create a small, furry Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a playful personality.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a long, fluffy creature with a happy expression.
Generate a Pokemon that has a striped body and loves to explore grassy fields.
Make a cute rodent-like Pokemon that can run swiftly and is known for its speed.
Imagine a Pokemon with a long tail and a friendly demeanor, perfect for companionship.
Design a Pokemon that has a brown and cream color scheme and an energetic personality.
Show me a fluffy, adorable Pokemon that enjoys living in forests and is rarely seen.
